content: stars by suzie p using dk yarn and 3mm hook row 1 chain 4 slip_stitch into 1st chain to join row 2 3ch is 1st double_crochet all in ring - 2 double_crochet 3ch 3dc x 4 3ch slip_stitch to top of ch3 to join row 3 slip_stitch to ch3 space 3 chain =1st double_crochet 2dc 3ch 3dc in chain 3 space 3dc 3ch 3dc all in next ch3 space x 4 slip_stitch to top of ch3 start now looks like a hexagon row 4 slip_stitch to chain 3 space 3ch =1st double_crochet 3dc ch4 4dc in ch3 space slip_stitch in centre stitch between the 2x3dc cluster below 4dc 4ch 4dc in next ch3 space x4 slip_stitch in centre of 2xdc cluster below slip_stitch to top of start ch3 to join row 5 ch1 single_crochet in back loop only of same st single_crochet in back loop only of next 3 stitches 3sc ch2 3sc in ch4 space single_crochet through back loops only of next 9 sts 1st one is tight and hidden away 3sc ch2 3 single_crochet in ch4 space x 4 single_crochet blo in last 5sts slip_stitch to join beginning ch1
